title: Your contact information
subtitle: Here you can indicate and edit the digital contact details to which you will receive the <0>acknowledgement of receipts</0> and <1>courtesy notices</1> of your notifications.
alert-dialog-email: If you do not have a PEC and access the notification on SEND within 5 days (120 hours) of sending the email, you will not receive the acknowledgement of receipt by registered mail.
alert-dialog-sms: If you do not have a PEC and access the SEND notification within 5 days (120 hours) of sending the SMS, you will not receive the acknowledgement of receipt by registered mail.

legal-contacts.pec-verify-descr: Please enter it below to confirm your PEC address. The code is valid for 10 minutes.
legal-contacts.pec-new-code: Didn't get it? Check that the PEC address is correct or
legal-contacts.remove-pec-message: Are you sure you want to remove the PEC address {{value}}?
legal-contacts.block-remove-pec-title: You cannot delete the PEC address
legal-contacts.block-remove-pec-message: In order to do this, you must first delete all the PEC addresses you have indicated under "Other contact details".
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-title: Do you want to cancel the verification?
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-content: If you cancel the verification, you will need to enter a new PEC address and restart the process.
legal-contacts.validation-progress-content: We are verifying that the PEC address is valid. You will receive an email with the result within 24 hours.

io-contact.title: IO app
io-contact.description: Activate the "Notifiche Digitali" service: when there is a notification for you, we send you a message in the app, where you can read it and pay any expenses. Here, you will also receive any important communications.

enable-modal.title: Do you want to activate the "Notifiche Digitali" service on IO?
enable-modal.content: If you do not have a PEC and access the notification within 5 days (120 hours) of sending the message, you will not receive the acknowledgement of receipt by registered mail.

disable-modal.title: Do you want to deactivate the "Notifiche Digitali" service on IO?
disable-modal.content: When you receive a notification, you will no longer receive an in-app message.

courtesy-contacts.email-verify-descr: Please enter it below to confirm your email address. The code is valid for 10 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.sms-verify-descr: Please enter it below to confirm your mobile number. The code is valid for 10 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.email-new-code: Didn't get it? Check that the email address is correct or
courtesy-contacts.sms-new-code: Didn't get it? Check that the mobile number is correct or
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-message: Are you sure you want to remove the email address {{value}}?
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-message: Are you sure you want to remove the mobile number {{value}}?
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-email-message: In order to do this, you must first delete all the email addresses you have indicated under "Other contact details".
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-sms-title: You can't delete the phone number
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-sms-message: In order to do this, you must first delete all the phone numbers you have indicated under "Other contact details".

special-contacts.subtitle: If you want the notifications of some organisations to be addressed to different addresses, you can indicate them here, replacing the main ones.
special-contacts.pec-already-exists: This organisation is already associated with a PEC address. If you press "Continue", it will be replaced by the one you just indicated.
special-contacts.sms-already-exists: This organisation is already associated with a mobile number. If you press "Continue", it will be replaced by the one you just indicated.
special-contacts.email-already-exists: This organisation is already associated with an email address. If you press "Continue", it will be replaced by the one you just indicated.
special-contacts.fetch-party-error: We were unable to retrieve the data needed to create a new contact detail.

common.duplicate-contact-descr: The contact {{value}} is already present, do you want to proceed anyway?

invalid_verification_code.title: Wrong code
invalid_verification_code.message: Please check and re-enter it, or generate another one.

retry_limit_code.title: You've made too many attempts
retry_limit_code.message: You have entered the wrong code too many times. To try again, press "Cancel", make sure the contact is correct and enter the new code.

expired_verification_code.title: This code has expired
expired_verification_code.message: Generate a new one and enter it.
